      • mkDir

        @RequestMapping(value="/hdfs/mkdir/{location}/{newDir}",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Boolean> mkDir(java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                                                                                                @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String location,
                                                                                                                                                                @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String newDir)
        Route to create a folder in HDFS
        Parameters:
        principal - - (Automatic) (Requires Admin)
        location - - (Base64 encoded) path to put new folder in
        newDir - - (Base64 encoded) name of folder to create
        Returns:
        true if folder successfully created

                                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String path)

      • putFile

        @RequestMapping(value="/hdfs/put",
                method=POST,
                consumes="multipart/form-data")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Boolean> putFile(java.security.Principal principal,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @RequestPart(value="location")
                                                                                                                                                                                             HDFSLocationInfo location,
                                                                                                                                                                                             @RequestPart(value="file")
                                                                                                                                                                                             org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
        Route to create a folder in HDFS
        Parameters:
        principal - - (Automatic) (Requires Admin)
        location - - (form-data.location) path to put file in
        file - - (form-data.file) file to put into HDFS
        Returns:
        true if folder successfully created

      • getFilePreview

        @RequestMapping(value="/hdfs/preview/{path}",
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getFilePreview(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String path)
        Route to preview a file in HDFS
        Parameters:
        path - - (Base64 encoded) path to preview
        Returns:
        the first ${edhd.hadoop.hdfsFilePreview} lines of the requested file

        @RequestMapping(value="/hdfs/get/{path}")
public void getFile(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                               @PathVariable
                                                               java.lang.String path)
        Route to retrieve a file from HDFS
        Parameters:
